text.section:
Proceeds derived from the sale of personal seat licenses that exceed the costs described in subsection (a) of this section:
may not accrue directly to the benefit of an individual or private entity; and
shall be held by the Authority for stadium construction and maintenance of the professional sports stadium in the State the relocated professional sports team uses.
